description: MCP server for Florentine.ai - Natural language to MongoDB aggregations

FLORENTINE_TOKEN.description: Your Florentine.ai API key, get it from https://florentine.ai/dashboard

LLM_SERVICE.description: The LLM service to use, one of 'openai', 'anthropic', 'google' or 'deepseek' (must only be provided if you did not set it in your Florentine.ai account)

LLM_KEY.description: Your API key for the LLM service (must only be provided if you did not set it in your Florentine.ai account)

SESSION_ID.description: Session ID for maintaining server-side context across requests

RETURN_TYPES.description: Stringified JSON array of return types for the response

REQUIRED_INPUTS.description: Stringified JSON array of values for required inputs keys
